region.description: Region where resources will be created

resourceGroupName.description: Name of the Resource Group where resources will be created

storageAccountName.description: Name of the Resource Group used for queue and Function App

resourceCreatedQueue.description: Name of the queue used as endpoint for the created resources Event Grid Subscription

resourceDeletedQueue.description: Name of the queue used as endpoint for the deleted resources Event Grid Subscription

tableName.description: Name of the Table Storage used for stocking resources creators

resourceCreatedSubscription.description: Name of the Event Grid Subscription for created resources

resourceDeletedSubscription.description: Name of the Event Grid Subscription for deleted resources

appServicePlanName.description: Name of the App Service Plan

applicationInsightName.description: Name of the Application Insight used to monitor the Function App
